about_the_game:
We are pleased to introduce you to the amazing Haunted Mill illustration by the Ukraine artist Betty Elgyn. This puzzle box is part of our special Halloween Edition series and will be released during our Halloween 2019 event. The illustration and its unique art capture the spirit of Halloween in a very special and engaging way.


Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special and limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration during the Halloween Special Event in order to get it and see what it is.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, and 2000 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in UHD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. This is a puzzle of a very hard challenge even if initially it might seem as relatively easy to do. The colors are in a similar palette all across the illustration and make even different areas hard to assemble. Use the unique elements in the scene to build your frame before proceeding with the rest of the puzzle.

Also, make sure to check the other 2 puzzle boxes in the series: Witched Night and Scarecrow Watcher.
detailed_description:
We are pleased to introduce you to the amazing Haunted Mill illustration by the Ukraine artist Betty Elgyn. This puzzle box is part of our special Halloween Edition series and will be released during our Halloween 2019 event. The illustration and its unique art capture the spirit of Halloween in a very special and engaging way.


Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special and limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration during the Halloween Special Event in order to get it and see what it is.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, and 2000 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in UHD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. This is a puzzle of a very hard challenge even if initially it might seem as relatively easy to do. The colors are in a similar palette all across the illustration and make even different areas hard to assemble. Use the unique elements in the scene to build your frame before proceeding with the rest of the puzzle.

Also, make sure to check the other 2 puzzle boxes in the series: Witched Night and Scarecrow Watcher.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 720p Capable Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min requirements might be subject of a change
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080p Capable Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements might be subject of a change

  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: A special edition puzzle box in the traditional art for the Masters of Puzzle game.
supported_languages: English, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
